Description:
312111772 - IN/SD/091221/A&M/01 - You failed to carry out a suitable and sufficient assessment as to whether asbestos, what type of asbestos, contained in what material, and in what condition, is present or is liable to be present in the premises at Edinburgh Road, Glasgow. If there was doubt as to whether asbestos was present at these premises, you failed to assume that asbestos was present, that this was not chrysotile alone, and thereby observe the applicable provisions of the Control of Asbestos Regulations 2012.

312111821 - IN/SD/091221/A&M/03 - You, as a contractor, failed to take suitable and sufficient steps to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, the risk of injury to a person during the carrying out of construction work arising from fire. You have also failed to provide suitable and sufficient fire-fighting equipment in suitable places.

312111858 - IN/SD/091221/A&M/02 - You, as an employer, failed to comply with the provisions of these Regulations in so far as they relate to matters which are within your control by ensuring that every work activity, including operation, use and maintenance of a system and work near a system, shall be carried out in such a manner as not to give rise, so far as is reasonably practicable, to danger.

312111875 - IN/SD/091221/A&M/04 - You have not appointed one or more competent persons to assist you in undertaking the measures you need to take to comply with the requirements and prohibitions imposed upon you by or under the relevant statutory provisions.
